articles.title: South Station fare gates are back in service after more than a week of closure
articles.description:
“Staff from vendor Scheidt & Bachmann will now resume the final testing and commissioning for the gates,” a spokesperson for Keolis said.

The post South Station fare gates are back in service after more than a week of closure appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: South Station fare gates reopened on February 4 after over a week of closure.
Scheidt & Bachmann staff will conduct final testing and commissioning of the gates.
Boston commuters can now access the station more efficiently with the gates operational.

articles.title: A 6th child has died from the flu in Mass. this flu season, along with 187 adults
articles.description:
Flu-like illness activity — which the state bases on outpatient visits for flu — remains high, recent flu data says.

The post A 6th child has died from the flu in Mass. this flu season, along with 187 adults appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Sixth child dies from flu in Massachusetts this season, raising concerns among families.
Total flu-related deaths include 187 adults, indicating widespread illness in the community.
Flu activity remains high, prompting health officials to urge vaccinations and preventive measures.

articles.title: Worcester couple sentenced for 18 years in prison for sex trafficking
articles.description:
The husband and wife were accused of advertising the victim to sex buyers online and trafficking the victim around New England.

The post Worcester couple sentenced for 18 years in prison for sex trafficking appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Worcester couple sentenced to 18 years for sex trafficking in New England.
Couple advertised victim online, impacting local safety and community awareness.
Case highlights ongoing issues of human trafficking affecting Boston area residents.

articles.title: The rumors are true: A new Kowloon location is on the way
articles.description:
The new Kowloon location will be located on Revere Beach and bring with it a new theme completely of its own.

The post The rumors are true: A new Kowloon location is on the way appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kowloon is opening a new location on Revere Beach, enhancing local dining options.
The new restaurant will feature a unique theme distinct from existing locations.
Residents can expect increased foot traffic and potential job opportunities in the area.

articles.title: Weymouth company creates 180-foot long Pats logo on ice ahead of Super Bowl
articles.description:
The company unveiled the giant Patriots logo, printed on Weymouth’s Back River, earlier this week on social media.

The post Weymouth company creates 180-foot long Pats logo on ice ahead of Super Bowl appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Weymouth company unveiled a 180-foot Patriots logo on Back River ice this week.
The logo was shared on social media ahead of the Super Bowl.
Local residents can enjoy the display as part of Super Bowl festivities.

articles.title: NFL insider: Maxx Crosby wants to play for Mike Vrabel, Patriots
articles.description:
"You guys are back on the map as a place that the players want to be because they're watching  it, they're seeing it."

The post NFL insider: Maxx Crosby wants to play for Mike Vrabel, Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Maxx Crosby expresses desire to join the Patriots under coach Mike Vrabel.
Crosby, a standout player, could enhance the Patriots' defense significantly.
Increased player interest may boost the team's competitiveness in upcoming seasons.

articles.title: Patriots get good news about Drake Maye’s shoulder in new injury report
articles.description:
"I wasn't limited on Monday so I don't see any way I'd be limited today. I'm feeling good."

The post Patriots get good news about Drake Maye’s shoulder in new injury report appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Drake Maye reports no limitations for practice ahead of Super Bowl LX.
Maye stated, 'I'm feeling good' regarding his shoulder injury.
Positive injury news boosts Patriots' morale for Boston fans ahead of the game.

articles.title: Watch: Savannah Guthrie posts message to her mother’s kidnapper asking to provide proof she is alive
articles.description:
“We need to know without a doubt that she is alive and that you have her."

The post Watch: Savannah Guthrie posts message to her mother’s kidnapper asking to provide proof she is alive appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Savannah Guthrie publicly appeals for proof of her mother's safety amid ongoing kidnapping situation.
Guthrie's mother was kidnapped, raising concerns for families in Boston about safety and crime.
The case highlights the need for community awareness and support for victims of abduction.
